import React, { Component } from "react"; import httpService from "../../services/httpService"; import config from "../../config.json"; class CustomerDeliveryNoteDetails extends Component { state = { deliveryNote: null, }; componentDidMount = async () => { const { data } = await httpService.get( `${config.apiendpoint}/customer/myDeliveryNote/${this.props.match.params.tenderId}` ); const { deliveryNote } = data; await this.setState({ deliveryNote }); console.log(this.state.deliveryNote); }; render() { const { deliveryNote } = this.state; if (deliveryNote === null) return null; return (
